label: A6BC8_cF60_225_d_a_ce-001
title: Mg$_{6}$MnO$_{8}$ Structure
comments: This can be seen as a distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_225_a_b-001}{rock salt ($B1$) structure} with four atoms removed.  Adding atoms to the (4b) site and setting $x_{4} = 1/4$ places all of the atoms on the sites of the rock salt crystal.
